description.full: The Games on Demand version supports  Japanese.  Three years ago, a legendary battle known as the Great Battle of Silla was once fought nearby. The area, which had been turned into a wasteland, is beginning to once more be covered in green and come back to life. People here had to work together in order to survive, and are working hard in hopes of rebuilding their beloved homeland. However, a foolish faction bent on inheriting the legacy of Silla has emerged... They have created a nation which they call Soma, and though it is not as strong as Silla, it is a powerful and well-known country throughout the land. After the fall of Silla, Soma sent their researchers back to this place to recover the gear of the holy spirit, a mystical artifact.  Known as the "Glimmering Feathers", the artifact possesses far more power than ordinary mechanical wings. By altering it with military technology, it is capable of being transformed into the godly bird Garuda Lo! "We have surpassed the technology of the gear of the holy spirit, behold and witness the true power of our "Gear of God". "Silla has long since perished! This land will now be ruled by Soma." "Those who dare stand in the way of our glorious path to victory will be rewarded with death! To challenge the invincibility of our great nation is folly!"
description.short: 三年前、シンラ大戦と呼ばれる戦争があった。 草木が生えないとさえ言われていた大地にも緑が茂るようになり、人々は、生きる為に力を出し合い、国を復興させる為に頑張っていた・・・ しかし、シンラの後に続こうとする愚かな者たちがいた・・・・ その者たちの国の名は【ソーマ】、以前はシンラの技術には及ばないまでも、かなりの力を持った国と名を馳せていた国だ。 シンラ崩壊後、その地を極秘裏に調査していた研究員たちの手により、聖霊機関がこの地で再び息を吹き返す。  この【機甲羽根】を越える力を持った【輝羽】が軍の技術に加われば、実験体を真のガルーダにすることが出来る！ 「・・我々は聖霊機関を超える真の聖霊機関を復活させたのだ・・」 「シンラは滅んだ！次はソーマがこの地を支配する。」 「我が国に歯向かう者の末路は！死！だ！我が国に敵なし！」
